poem:
Title: "Frothy Drama in Shades of Noir"

In an echo of French noir, irony does tread,
Elegant suspense teased from silken thread.
Up the ladder, a sprite in work-worn shoes,
Climbs 'neath the guise of charming ruse.
Ploys unfolding on a muted stage,
Simmering drama in every page,
A comic waltz of truth and guise,
In the theater of life, where true evil lies.
